## Material and methods

### Subjects

```{r}
analysis_data <- as.data.frame(analysis_data)
describe(x = analysis_data[c("age",
                             "height",
                             "weight",
                             "train_years",
                             "train_volume")] , na.rm = T) %>%
  round() %>%
  select(c("mean", "sd", "median", "min", "max")) %>%
  my_table(
    caption = paste0(
      "<center><strong>Anthropological values (n = ",
      nrow(analysis_data) ,
      ")</center></strong>"
    )
  )
```
